remarks: Change variables in a Diophantine set, using class notation.  This allows already proved Diophantine sets to be reused in contexts with more variables.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 16-Oct-2014.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Jun-2015.)
statement:
diophren $p |- ( ( S e. ( Dioph ` N ) /\ M e. NN0 /\ F : ( 1 ... N ) --> ( 1 ... M ) ) -> { a e. ( NN0 ^m ( 1 ... M ) ) | ( a o. F ) e. S } e. ( Dioph ` M ) ) $.
$d F a $.
$d M a $.
$d N a $.
$d S a $.
